Class RedBlackTreeNode<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • DefaultBinaryTreeNode<T>
      • RedBlackTreeNode<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryTreeNode<T>

    public class RedBlackTreeNode<T>
extends DefaultBinaryTreeNode<T>
implements BinaryTreeNode<T>
    RedBlackTreeNode extends the function of a BinaryTreeNode by adding a way to keep track of the node's parent and adding a boolean value that says whether this is a red or black node. This is used by the RedBlackTree class to restructure the tree.
